website_summaries.verdict: Apple's aging mid-range tablet is still the perfect mix of size and performance for nearly everyone.
pros: The iPad Air 2 has a great balance of size and weight
iOS 9 runs perfectly, including split-screen apps
cons: Priced relatively high for a tablet
single speaker isn't that loud compared to iPad Pro

customer_reviews.title: It’s a hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased a refurbished iPad and it looked as good as new, no scratches, no dents, everything ran great. I decided to purchase another iPad for my daughter and it had a deep scratch on the screen, I returned it, then placed a second order. The second iPad had deep scratches and sticker residue on the back but the front screen seemed ok. It’s a hit or miss. I don’t have time to be mailing the item back and forth. You’re rolling the dice with these iPads. They’re SELLER refurbished quality, definitely not factory refurbished quality which would probably hold a higher standard.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: A waste of time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a Christmas gift and received it very prompt but there was a problem . i didn't bother to check the iPad which was a major mistake. they opened it on christmas and it wouldn't turn on. The iPad would not hold a charge it would charge enough to turn on and then turn back off bc of low battery. Amazon was very helpful and help me through the return process to receive my funds.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY this piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: The screen is felling apart, and the back of the iPad is not even flat, it’s like something had not been installed properly inside. This is not a renewed or used product, it’s a damaged iPad with a third party low quality screen replacement.
customer_reviews.author: AsimoO

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Device had a minor scratch on the back, no problem right? So I thought, until after about two hours of using the iPad, the digitizer (the touch sensor) became completely unresponsive. Cannot trust this certified refurbished product. Going to Apple, same price much higher quality refurbished products! I dabbled in the third-party area, and I got burnt!
customer_reviews.author: Travis C

customer_reviews.title: Item as described..
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 64gb gold one. Fired it up and immediately had a battery issue. Hardware related, no fault of the battery itself. Emailed the retailer and within 6 hours received a response and after giving my order number, got a shipping label, and item is on way back for refund. In the meantime I purchased another one to replace it, and this unit has been flawless so far. No scratches on either one, had no issues updating it, or anything else so far. I will update this if I have an issue with getting the refund on the first one. Would I purchase again? So far, yes.
customer_reviews.author: propflux01

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival.
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed that I got it the next day. That amazement faded fast when I picked up the box and heard the iPad rattling around inside. Sure enough, it was DOA. After contacting support and trying different things to get the power on, it was agreed it was a goner. And, the return was approved. Even before I printed out the label I ordered another. Shucks, it's going to take 4 days to get it. Oh well, maybe it will be packaged better. I'll be sure to post about it as soon as I see if it will power up
customer_reviews.author: James Transue

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BOTHER - Find a different seller
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY unhappy with what I received. I've ordered certified, refurbished Apple products before but never have I received something like this! From the dented and stained box to the sticky mess on top of the box to the NON-STANDARD cable and plug - this was awful. I strongly suggest that you find another seller because this is not the Apple Certified Refurbished standard that I'm used to. The plug doesn't even fit in the box - I had to tear the packaging to get the plug out.
customer_reviews.author: Kandi M. Humpf

customer_reviews.title: The shipping was the best. I ordered 2 I pad air 2
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was the best. I ordered 2 I pad air 2, first one the battery won't stay charged. The second one messages and FaceTime would not work so I sent that one back and kept the one that won't stay charged for now. Really sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Manassero

customer_reviews.title: Two tries, two significant defects.
customer_reviews.text: First one looked new, worked fine, until came time to set up fingerprint, and reader would not work. Retried seberal times after resetting. Second one looked crappy. Again, worked fine until I tried to connect with a BT speaker. No bluetooth. Tried several speakers, none worked. Two simple things that should have been caught in reconditioning process. Not trying a third time—PITA.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two - neither one could be charged.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these, refurbished - when it arrived, plugging in the included charger did nothing. I wiggled it, and if I held my finger against the charger it would indicate that it was charging, but as soon as I let go, it quit. I swapped out the cable that came with it for another one I've used for other devices in the past, and the same thing happened. So I did an Amazon return for another of the same item, and the second one had exactly the same problem. I don't recommend buying this product unless you're willing to just keep exchanging them until you happen to get one that is usable.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Consider this a “used” item not “like new”
customer_reviews.text: This “like new” item is anything but. The edges have dents and deep scratches not minor surface scratches- it has clearly been dropped previously. The screen was dirty, scratched, and on one of the corners there is a small chip in the glass. There was also a weird stick on back “cover” that you cannot remove. It looks like all they did was reset it, throw in a new cheapo charger and mail it off. I am not convinced anything inside has been refurbished to like new standards. It probably works fine, but the damage is not worth it for me. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, fast shipping, great product! I wanted a new iPad Air 2 or a iPad Pro. Tempted to go with the Pro, but thought it was more than I needed. Found this refurb Air 2 at a great price, and couldn't justify spending $800-$1,000 on the Pro when the Air 2 refurb was under $300. Too good a deal to pass up. Almost a week in with it so far. Just like new. No physical anomalies indicating it was a refurb, and functionally it is as new. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Received the ipad. Finished the initial set up. The ipad started crashing, shutting off and restarting. At first it happened when I opened an app, then the problem increased in frequency until it was shutting off and turning on continuously. Tried Amazon support and a factory restore. No luck. Returning the ipad and am very disappointed. Was planning on taking it on a trip tomorrow. Will not have a new one in time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristan Caffee

customer_reviews.title: Bad iPad lightening charging port?
customer_reviews.text: Used charger and cable that came with unit and charged for a couple hours. When I came back I noticed unit was still at 81% charge where I started. I then noticed whenever I moved charging cable near the iPad lightening port, the unit blinked on and off charging. I did not try to see if it could have been just the cable, the cable looked very good, and I was fairly ticked at this point. This is my first experience with "Renewed" equipment. Needless to say I am not enthused at this point. I returned unit for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: jayson

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: We purchased three iPads from this listing. They all look perfect and function well. All three looked brand new and there was no indication they had ever been used. Our only problem (which has been incredibly problematic with all three) is the battery life. They die quickly and take forever to charge. They sent Samsung USB ports with them instead of Apple or generic chargers. We tried our Apple chargers to see if that helped, but it doesn’t. We have dimmed the screens, closed apps in the background, and tried multiple other things to preserve battery life, but nothing seems to help.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMommy

customer_reviews.title: CAVEAT EMPTOR!! They advertised this as 4G, ...
customer_reviews.text: CAVEAT EMPTOR!! They advertised this as 4G, (cellular) but when we took it to the Verizon store, they said it was Wi-Fi only. The refurbished unit we received was clean and appeared to work well with Wi-Fi. However, the lack of truth in advertising was disturbing. If 4G means something different than cellular, then I guess the joke is on me. However, that's why I asked my wife to confirm it's meaning prior to ordering it for her.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioned wifi radio
customer_reviews.text: Beware of this iPad. I bought one as a gift for my bf and the wifi button stopped working the next morning after the software update. Turns out the wifi radio in the unit was malfunctioned and I had to return in. I just bought a second iPad from this company, giving them one more chance, and am using it now- so far it has worked midiocre. It is glitchy at times. If I have one more issues with this iPad I am going to return it and purchase from somewhere else. Apple products aren't what they once were
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No scratches or defects
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that this iPad came with no scratches to the outer body and worked perfectly. The last one I bought thru an Amazon seller (not this one) had an engraving that had been scratched out but I spent a bit more money and got one that was supposedly in better condition. It’s been 2-3 months and it’s actually perfect! I was totally ready to return it if I hadn’t come in good condition but I’m pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I use my iPad daily for news, several apps and watching my Shows and movies both at home and during my business travel including flights. When I dropped my iPad Air 2 and the screen cracked I thought this was a good approach to get back up and running and saving $400 over the new price I paid several years back. This is the second renewed product purchased from Amazon and I am very happy with both choices.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk J. Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Great price, but beware of limited warranty...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these, one for the wife and I, in January 2016. Looked like new, worked flawlessly out of the box. However, my wife's screen began changing randomly, "phantom" touches and going haywire within the last 3 months. Unfortunately, there is no one year warranty like you would get buying refurbished from Apple. We're stuck either taking it to Apple for repair or just getting a new one. We saved a little bit of money initially, but probably well worth it to buy a refurb from Apple for a slightly higher price and getting that one year warranty coverage ( plus you can buy AppleCare extended warranty as well).
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Warner

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my boys for Christmas; they had Fire tablets but I wanted to get them a tablet I could sync with there iPhones. They freaked out when they opened them and love them! When we got them they were $220 a piece. The battery life is not long but they use these to mostly watch YouTube and play Fortnite on so the fact they play videos could be a bigger contributor, but the tablet still died although it was plugged in. Some people reviewed about the chargers but the chargers we got were Apple chargers. The tablets were in great condition, no dents nor scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Clements

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality control!
customer_reviews.text: The iPad would not hold a charge. I returned it within a couple of days, but have not received my $250.00 refund. I ended up going to Best Buy and purchasing a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Babner

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Happy so far (I've had less than a week). The IPad looked brand new and did not have any pics or apps on it as others have mentioned. My boyfriend didn't have any issues when transferring info from his iPhone. The reason for 4 stars rather than 5...It did not come with a charger (luckily we have plenty) and can't get Icare. Overall happy with purchase and savings over buying new. I will update if any issues arise over the next year
customer_reviews.author: Erin with help from Earl the cat

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my husband when his I-pad mini died.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be working so far. I haven't used it but my husband said that the bigger screen makes it easier to see things more clearly. We are in our 70s and that sort of thing is getting more important. Other than that, I don't know if he has gotten it completely set up or knows how to use it completely. We did get a glass screen cover and case to protect it since we tend to drop things. No problems yet... I'm still using my mini
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery is draining too quickly
customer_reviews.text: It looks brand new, but there is a problem with the battery on this refurbished I-pad. It drains really fast even when I am just reading. If I am streaming or on-line, it's even faster. Even when it is not in use, it will go from a 90% charge to 6% in minutes for some reason. While Amazon support was very nice, I think he was Googling the same things I was and I had already changed settings and taken other steps to maximize battery life. I spoke with a representative from the company today, and they will send me a replacement once they receive my return. I will update my review based on the results of the replacement i-pad.
customer_reviews.author: Cara MacKay

customer_reviews.title: Only 70 minutes battery life?????
customer_reviews.text: While the device was clean and was not overly scratched or damaged, the battery life is abysmal. It arrived with 1% charge. It took 18 hours to reach full charge (with screen off and on full-size iPad charger). After 35 minutes of use, the device was down to 52% battery life. At just barely an hour of use, the battery was completely dead.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson Wade Bauman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This iPad is perfect the only flaw found was in the back bottom corner there is a small scuff, other than that you can not tell it was even used. So far the battery life seems to be good. I currently have it wrapped up now under the tree for my 7 year old. I logged into the iPad and got everything set up. It came in a brown box with a charger.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a rip off, had problems with it cutting out constantly, I doubt this was ever reconditioned. This company should be removed from Amazon!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the fact that it states that this iPad was tested and renewed the battery life was garbage and it kept turning off and on indicating that it needed to be charge. once powered on it was charged without me plugging up long story short it states its under warranty but when contacting apple its out of warranty. im in the proccess of having apple provided a new battery which i have to come out of pocket 100 dollars to repair if thats the actual problem. save your money not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all, bad seller
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT order anything from the seller PDI Mobile. I bought two “renewed” iPad Air 2’s from them: the first had a huge dent and the screen didn’t work, the replacement had a weak battery that died within 140 days - AFTER the 90 warranty, so they will do nothing. They obviously don’t do a full refurb with replacement batteries, have little to no quality control, and will not stand behind their products. With the $99 price tag on a new Apple battery, this puts you at $400 for a used IPad, so save yourself the trouble and get a certified Apple refurbished version for $19 more.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Zaw

customer_reviews.title: Does its job and still relevant in 2019
customer_reviews.text: This is not an Ipad Pro, dont even try to make it one. That being said, The Air 2 was iOS 12.3 compatible when I wrote this, and all the apps from the app store worked with it. Easy to use and understand, the screen resolution is good. You can use 'procreate' on this ipad, and it works fine. That being said, the apple pencil wont work with this ipad and you have to use something else, like a bamboo fineliner stylus.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Super Quality and Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Apple iPad 2 Gold 9'7 Amazon Refurbished. by Seller Certified Tech Pro I must say this, I could have never found such a great quality purchage for the prize I received! needless to say, works great without any problem at all. Takes good pictures (camera) clear window, excellent color quality and volume. Delivery was super fast and came with extra security ( signature required) This is my secound ipad and I am very pleased. The amazon Theme was very helpful and friendly, when i was in need for a bit help to sett up security and all. I was not much familiar with apple products. Still learning. Highly Recommanded. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: H. S.

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is awful
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to actually use the iPad today for more than an hour or so. My son was using it for part of the day in the car for a road trip, and the battery died so fast. I am super unimpressed by that. I need something that lasts . As we are about to get on an airplane and need the battery life to last . Who wants an iPad where the battery life is 5 hours?
customer_reviews.author: Sharilynn

customer_reviews.title: If I didn't know better, I'd say this was brand spanking new!
customer_reviews.text: If I didn't know better, I'd say this was brand spanking new! I'll never buy a brand new iPad for 2x the cost again. I'm glad others do, so I can get one 1 year old for 50% or more off...
customer_reviews.author: Daveh777

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't reccomend
customer_reviews.text: When I turned it on to set it up, the screen was going crazy. It was going in and out the whole time. I finished setting it up hoping it would be fine when it got to the home screen and it was just as bad. I contacted the customer service number and email that was provided in the box, and got zero response. Sent it back for a refund and got one for the same price off the apple online store and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: iPad Air 2
customer_reviews.text: This iPad Air 2 seems to work fine and I believe that it saved me several hundred dollars over purchasing a brand new unit from a big box retailer. I needed to replace my original iPad because it could no longer be updated to the latest operating system whereas this unit appears to be "updatable" for a long time into the future. The battery life is acceptable and it has a clear and bright screen. It runs all of the Apple programs and its processor seems to be very fast. I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Norman L. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Deal!
customer_reviews.text: We took my son's old iPad to get diagnostics and repair. It would have taken 2-3 days for diagnostics and the screen replacement alone would have been $299. We ordered this from my phone in the parking lot of the repair shop and had it delivered the same day for less than the cost of a new screen professionally installed. It's perfect. I would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Who sends a none Apple product with a Apple product, knowing the risk of it catching on fire.
customer_reviews.text: The product seem fine, but the plug was not an apple plug, and i will not accept that. It is a writeup that shows, unauthentic proper plug for apple products or other brand products can affect the item. So i am going to give the company 48 hours to send the proper Apple product plug for Apple Ipad. I currently just bought another apple Ipad and I want the proper plug for that as well. If i have to purchase on my own I will request a refund. This is not right or even good customer service. Send the right product or refund me my money!
customer_reviews.author: carat

customer_reviews.title: I got a dud, and it took me too long to realize it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gamble andI lost. The Battery life is horrendous. It won’t stay charged for more than an hour, it drains duper fast and charges supper slow, the screen is a bootleg plastic replacement and it has dead zones. Honestly, I wish I would have used it more shortly after I purchased it, because I would have returned it, now it’s too late, but be warned, if you buy one of these, Check it out thoroughly, right away. My machine was refurbished with substandard parts.
customer_reviews.author: Syed J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice.
customer_reviews.text: My old iPad Air (1) was dropped and cracked last week and was otherwise just fine for my need. So, I decided to see if I could find a used replacement. Ordered an iPad Air 2 with 128GB memory (my old one had 32) for a little over $200. I get it in two days, perfect condition, no scratches or scrapes great battery life, and faster processor than before and slightly bigger screen in same package. Couldn’t be more pleased. Great way to go, at least for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Fan

customer_reviews.title: If it stops working, Amazon doesn't fix the problem for you.
customer_reviews.text: This product stopped working in less than one year. Amazon only gives a 90 day warranty, but my ipad stop being able to charge by six months; and then customer services just tells me to contact apple - which is crazy! What the hell is apple going to do about it! If the product is refurbished by amazon and stops functioning, apple isn't going to fix anything. Amazon has really started to provide lousy service in the last few years. I won't be buying refurbished things anymore.
customer_reviews.author: SKY

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy unless you want a headache and broken iPad
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my daughter to go off to collage and when we got it we charged it. Then unplugged it it shut off. So we turned it back on and it shut off again. We called amazon and they Transferred us to Apple. Apple did testing on the battery and the battery was no good and they wanted $99 to replace it. So we contacted amazon and they didn’t want to return it due to it being a 3rd party seller. They did return it but it was a big headache so buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Gressy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I'm seeing reviews over the years of unsatisfied customers but I guess that is the luck of the draw when it comes to refurb. I am more than happy for what I picked up under $200. There was a very small spec on the glass that I was not able to remove however this iPad will primarily be used to run a Mavic Mini and for that purpose I am OK with it. Battery life seems awesome and overall speed is a huge upgrade from my old iPad 2. I am confident enough with this seller that I'm going to recommend my girlfriend order one too.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry B.

customer_reviews.title: Wow What a Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a dead iPad and was surprised Amazon had certified refurbished units. I was thinking about going with an Android tablet but they don't approach the iPad's resolution. The unit I got is in nice shape and pretty much indistinguishable from new. I haven't had a chance to put it through a day's work yet but I do not anticipate any issues. I am happy with this purchase and glad Amazon has such a variety of items!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Purchased refurbished iPad Air 2
customer_reviews.text: Screen has quite a bit of discoloration especially when viewing or taking photos. Touch screen has some issues. Doesn’t always recognize the touch. There’s a good size dent on the side of the iPad but it does not crack the screen. Doesn’t hold charge very well and doesn’t always recognize that a charger has been plugged into it. Sometimes difficult to remove the charger from the plug hole. Seems bent. Cheap iPad but not the best refurbished quality. If it was for me I would have returned it but I Purchased for my son to play games on so we decided to keep it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: EYJMM

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy a refurbished again unless it’s just to through money away
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that there was so many cosmetic damage than what the site shows screen was scratched up that even a tinted tempered protector doesn’t even hide the back was all scratched up and the volume down button doesn’t even work. The edges of the pad looks like some one had a case and was dropping it all over the place so it left a line following along the whole pad were it was covering. But since it’s going to my 2 year old I’m sure it will not last this year.. good thing I only baught it for when we go on road trips to keep him busy.
customer_reviews.author: roy tapia

customer_reviews.title: Indistinguishable from new
customer_reviews.text: My "new" iPad arrived today. Everything is perfect: product, packaging, price, shipping and delivery time. It is indistinguishable from a new iPad. I will recommend this seller to anyone who cares to listen, but I might wait a couple of months to be sure nothing fails. Having saved $250, I hoped for the product I got, and secretly worried about the product I'd get! I was warned by other reviewers that the charger wasn't standard, so I got a new one and it has no problem charging.
customer_reviews.author: Loane Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Expect to pay shipping to return if it doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed fine until it was time to charge the battery. It simply would not charge. I was happy with the refund time. I am very UNhappy that this company uses terms like “use our free shipping label.” The shipping label may be free to print, but it says right on it that you’re expected to pay to ship their useless piece of tech back to them. Misleading as heck. Cost me $16 to have nothing.
customer_reviews.author: alaskanmama

customer_reviews.title: iPad is Great- Update- However, Short Lived
customer_reviews.text: The iPad worked wonderfully for my Granddaughter. Update 12/22- My granddaughter just told me that the iPad is NO Longer charging the battery when the power cord is plugged in. Now I need to contact Amazon to see about returning and replacing the “Renewed” iPad . I was afraid of that when buying “Renewed”. UGH.
customer_reviews.author: rubendwr

customer_reviews.title: Great condition
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition. No scratches or anything. Works perfect. I bought it to watch Netflix and Hulu on. Video quality is amazing. I was worried because of the other reviews and the pictures they put up with damaged screens. Mine has one little scratch that you can’t even see on the back. Literally in perfect condition though. You can’t even tell unless you go looking and it’s not even on the screen. If you’re debating I would say go ahead and order. They have a 30 day return policy if your not happy
customer_reviews.author: Lese Denney

customer_reviews.title: A stellar product from Apple in both form and function
customer_reviews.text: I bought a refurbished iPad Air 2 in gold with 64 GB of storage for myself a couple of months ago. It arrived in perfect condition. Like most Apple products it is so useful and handy, and easy to transport. My son recommended I add a Belkin keyboard case. I was able to get a used one at a reduced price. It, also, arrived in perfect physical and operating condition. Recently, I went on a trip and decided not to take my laptop. Instead I took just the iPad Air 2 in its keyboard case. With a little advanced planning I was able to do everything on it as I could have on my laptop. Great products!
customer_reviews.author: All4Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This iPad is fantastic. I was a little nervous buying this iPad online because it was such a good price. However, it arrived on time and has no issues. I have had it for about 5 months now, and it has been wonderful. Somedays it seems like the battery lasts forever, and other days it appears to die quickly. It could be me just not paying attention to the battery life, but that is the only potential complaint I have. It had no scratches or cracks. The system was up to date and continues to update correctly. I highly recommend this iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I bought this iPad specifically for managing my small business & taking pictures of my products for my website but the camera doesn’t work properly. There is black shadowing all along the bottom of the picture and a black spot on the side of the picture. I am returning for refund asap. I just got the return label and I have to pay out of my own pocket to return a defective product! Terrible customer service! Do not buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Thought it Was!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this product. The “home” button did not recognize my thumb print. It wasn’t even recognized under Settings. It even stopped working altogether and the button became nonfunctional. I had to use the virtual button to use my pad during my vacation. I took it to the Apple store and found out how old the iPad really was and the touch screen was non dapple replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery Doesn't Hold a Charge!!!! Waste of Money!
customer_reviews.text: If I could, I'd give ZERO STARS! This iPad was working fine for the first 6 months, but now it won't hold a charge. At 80% it just DIES! I have to keep it plugged in if I want more than 30 minutes of screen time. Otherwise, it just DIES! Apparently the Amazon Renewed inspection doesn't do much good. I've wasted money on this piece of junk. DO NOT BUY FROM AMAZON RENEWED!!
customer_reviews.author: cisco

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using this for almost a month with no problems. Hopefully it will continue to work as well as it has so far. Got the protection plan but overall so far it is worth it for the savings. He is thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: Big Watusi

customer_reviews.title: 3 month review
customer_reviews.text: Lets be honest this is a refurbished product. So, if you're expecting a brand new iPad go smack yourself. For the price I paid this iPad is amazing. I think there was one scratch and it is barely noticeable. The software runs like any typical iPad amd came with a 90 day warranty. The only con that I have had is that it does not get as bright as my old IPad Air. This could be the ipad, however, I do wear corrective lens so there's that. Overall with it being delivered within a week and the quality I'm satisfied. *knock on wood*
customer_reviews.author: Abena Mánsã

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with product. Two out of three did not function well and one not at all
customer_reviews.text: Over all disappointed with the product. One iPad never charged and was returned, one iPad is very slow charging and battery has short life. The third one seems to be functioning well. These iPads were for our after school program for K-5th grades and would have been very helpful Can’t understand how they could be refurbished and tested and two out of three were flawed
customer_reviews.author: Rand Fuller

customer_reviews.title: ... with a 90 day warranty but so far so good i had to immediately update working systems but that ...
customer_reviews.text: i have only had it for a week and it bothered me that it only came with a 90 day warranty but so far so good i had to immediately update working systems but that went well heres hoping it does not crash on day 91 i would have more faith if they at least gave a one year warranty
customer_reviews.author: Judith D. Woronka

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product. Cheap Charger.
customer_reviews.text: 5/29/2020 — So far the item is as described. I needed to physically connect it to my Macbook to update it, but that's more of an Apple issue than anything. The only real complaint thus far is the charger. While I wasn't expecting an actual Apple charger, I was expecting at least a charger that wasn't hot to the touch after plugging it in for less than 5 minutes. If this device lasts past the 90 day exchange period, I'll be ordering a genuine Apple charger.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've made in 2020
customer_reviews.text: I was worried before buying. Mainly about the quality and battery. It's been 2 weeks now and for starters when I got the iPad, it was FLAWLESS. I couldn't find one scratch or imperfection. And as far as the battery. I've given it heavy and light use both. Discharged the battery fully etc. No issues to report. The iPad gets normal battery life. All in all I am shocked at how good it's been for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Dangle

customer_reviews.title: Couple of Scratches, Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: This iPad seems to be working excellently. I just set it up and everything is working so far, I just need to organize the device to my liking. Mine came with the gold deviant and it oddly enough was cover with some weird plastic cover that seems to be from a previous owner. Once removing, I found a couple of pretty good scratches on the back, but nothing that would be super noticeable or embarrassing. It is a previously owned iPad, and for the price I paid, those two scratches don’t bother me one bit!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Reason why it it "refurbished"
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of use the product the I pad no longer works. My original I pad that is now 7 years old still going strong. Purchased this unit to run a golf simulator, battery constantly dies, the output jack that is connected to my projector no longer works. Do yourself a favor and do not buy these "Refurbished" items, they do not stand the test of time and only work for a short while.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great looking device.  Does not get past set up stage.
customer_reviews.text: Device arrived and looked great. Turned it on and transferred data from my daughter's old broken device. Went through set up until it got to the upgrade iOS portion. Device iOS would not upgrade, no matter what I did. Tested on multiple internet connections. Thus, device is essentially useless. Returning it manufacturer for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M. Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to use as a log book. The applications are endless though. I also use it to watch Netflix, listen to music, Maps, Search for truck stops ect. Much easier than dragging out my lap top every time I need to look something up. Much more user friendly than my phone. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Brock

customer_reviews.title: Probably won’t ever buy refurbished again
customer_reviews.text: Returned because battery was defective. Kept turning off even if it was plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA THOMASON

customer_reviews.title: Got the latest model for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived as promised on time and it great shape in the original packaging and with all accessories. It functions just like a new unit and I use it every day. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer support and excellent condition
customer_reviews.text: Came in absolutely perfect condition with maybe one or two super small scratches near the bottom of the screen (barely visible unless purposefully looking for scratches). I loved this iPad and everything worked perfectly. I didn’t want to return it but ended up returning it anyway because it was not compatible with the Apple Pencil. Got a full refund and customer support was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Reese

customer_reviews.title: Good and cheap Ipad for starting toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my nephew. A bit slow response due to app installations. This is a good and cheap Ipad to have specially when u have a toddler and they’re not aware of how to use it. You won’t regret buying it when it breaks. You know toddlers always does. Good Ipad for starting toddlers. Won’t upgrade to latest OS due to software issues.
customer_reviews.author: Warlito

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a like new tablet that was best in class just a couple years ago.
customer_reviews.text: Would buy again. For the price it was a great buy. Very capable tablet. It's refurbished but was top tablet just a couple years ago. It was like new for a fraction of the original price and best in class just a couple years ago. Now I am rethinking the whole buying new thing for refurbished electronics like tablets and computers.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Leckey

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 11 year old for Christmas; so far it seems lovely. Packaging was very professional & cord/adapter was new. Great relief considering I’d ordered this same iPad prior to this one from another distributor on amazon and it arrived DOA & wouldn’t hold a charge. I’m grateful this one seems to be everything it was described to be. Thank you for making mine and my sons Christmas a great one!
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Just like new
customer_reviews.text: Pad just arrived. It's in like new condition. Not a scratch. I purchased this specifically for my Gaia gps app. Took a short drive in my TJ and it worked perfectly (with Bluetooth antenna). This is my 4th tablet/pad to get it right. Thanks to Amazon's return policy i never worried about returning. Tried Android 6.0, 7.0 and an earlier version of an iPad (IOS was too old to work). Very relieved this works!
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Kept disconnecting during restore
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered kept disconnecting in the middle of restoring it from my backed up ipad. It was also acting buggy (crashing and restarting during setup). This one was a dud. They sent out a new one to replace it, but that one couldn't recognize my wi-fi. Another dud. This company is quick to send out replacements, but I am wondering if I'll just get another dud. I'm bummed. The prices seemed pretty good, but even if I did get one that made it through the initial setup phase, it makes me wonder if there is some other hidden problem that won't rear it's head until several weeks or month into usage.
customer_reviews.author: Rigel W Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: When I received it I did a quick inspection of it and the one I got was near perfect! It has one big scrap on the bottom of it near the charging port but it doesn't affect usability and you can't really notice it unless you are plugging it in. It performs great and is still receiving updates from apple. It can get the latest iPadOS.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: iPad comparison to android
customer_reviews.text: I am an Android fan but it has become necessary to adopt an iOS device for music integration at our church. That being said, the device does work very well but is not an upgrade or improvement over what I usually use (samaung tab s2). I have noticed that it is more touch responsive and Apple pay is slightly easier to use. I also appreciate the additional security of the device and safari. Is a good product and would buy again, however, not compelled to become an iPad fanboy or switch to iOS exclusively.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Stegeman

customer_reviews.title: Worth Buying
customer_reviews.text: Was very hesitant to buy renewed. Lots of mixed reviews about battery life and screen flickering or touch mechanics. Battery life on my renewed Air 2 is great. The charger they sent as well is 3rd party but charges the iPad fast. Touch works great and everything from web browsing to gaming works fast and flawlessly. And you can’t beat the prices. Over all I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Edwards

customer_reviews.title: 16GB. No good.
customer_reviews.text: Very responsible seller. Product arrived very well and in perfect condition. The only problem is that it is 16 GB between operating system and consumes almost 15 GB. it has no space at all. I had to return it and spend a little more and buy a 128 GB one. I recommend that if you are going to buy an iPad that is 64 GB or more.
customer_reviews.author: Juan oyola

customer_reviews.title: Fast refund issued. No problem with iPod
customer_reviews.text: I realized that the iPod wasn't going to be good for what I had bought it for. So I ended up sending it back the next day after receiving it. The iPod did work great the little I used it, but I was very impressed with the company they issued a refund within hours of us shipping the iPod back. So if you are hesitant to buy refurbished I would definitely give these guys a shot you don't really have anything to lose.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: WiFi stopped within working 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Jul 11 and 4 months later the WiFi has stopped working. One month after the warranty ran out !! I would suggest you stay away from these refurbished items.
customer_reviews.author: Marc12205

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the right size
customer_reviews.text: I recently started in direct sales and needed a tablet to bring on the road and this is perfect for what I need it to do and then some! I couple scratches on the sides but i have it in a case so you can't even tell and it has zero effect on how it works! Very Happy
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottery drops to zero during facetime while device is even plugged !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I set it for a PD person in overseas to Facetime with her everyday, But the battery is horrible! It drops to zero from 100 suddenly even it is plugged all time and of course drops the call and never back again until restart!!! Really bad experience!!!! Don’t recommend it at all
customer_reviews.author: Mojgan

customer_reviews.title: Skip iPad Pro this table is like a iPad Pro
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on Tuesday afternoon got it on Friday afternoon and you can’t tell it’s used at all. Everything works beautifully. It’s fast and last for a 1 day and a half and it runs fortnite and many other new games beautifully. And watching movies on it is very nice tho it does only have two speakers on the bottom which takes getting use to because it sounds like when you only have one ear bud in but other than that I highly recommend this tablet
customer_reviews.author: Alonna

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical because it is a renewed product and there are some negative reviews about the product but I can say that the one I received looks brand new. The only issue I had was that they did not provide the original chargers which could affect the product in the long run but being that you save so much money compared to buying a new one, purchasing an official apple charger would still make this a worth wild buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: I love this iPad
customer_reviews.text: I love this iPad. I upgraded from the Mini 2 to this one and I really love the extra screen space, not to mention the look and feel. It feels like a small laptop (minus the keyboard) and running iOS. I use it a lot for editing videos in iMovie, making music in GarageBand, and using it as a screen for my drone. I don't know what else to say. If you like iPads, this is a great version. TouchID is one thing I very much sought on an iPad, as well, which I was glad to see on this.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described with no issues. The one that I received had no damage noted to it at all. I can see this as it did not have a box but I knew that it was a renewed item. I did not turn it on from just examining it. I saw no blemishes, I did return the item only because I found a newer one on Black Friday
customer_reviews.author: Kim Smith

customer_reviews.title: If it wasn’t for the packing I wouldn’t know it wasn’t new.
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, as a refurbished unit, I didn’t expect everything to be perfect, however, the iPad itself looked and worked as new (albeit with a very slightly shorter battery life). Only the packing, charging block and lightning cable didn’t appear as new. Overall, for the price paid, the condition and function is excellent and when this starts to die in 3 or 4 years, I’ll certainly buy another “refurb” of this quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lee S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Hadn't had an iPad since a few years, since it was school issues, so I decided to try it out. It's excellent for reading my textbooks for engineering, as well as article papers for research, plus the night shift allows for less stress to be applied into my vision. Additionally, i can do amazing digital art with it, as it is very responsive to a stylus, and that is because I began using it after installing tempered glass for protection. The greatest thing is, the technology inside it is closely related to the summer research I'm undertaking this year.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis St. James

customer_reviews.title: Good used quality
customer_reviews.text: Device came with a bit dirty. Sticky residue on the plastic over screen and grungy back. I took a Lysol wipe to it and it was fine. Signs of wear (small wear spot/scratches around charging port. Haven’t tested full battery life yet. But no issues with device hardware so far. Did arrive with out of date software, iOS 10 (current is 13)
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Bergmann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice excellent quality.... very happy customer
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my mom, beautiful upgrade from her original iPad ( 16gb 1gen ) yes that old, the colors so vivid, speed fantastic sound is crystal clear
customer_reviews.author: NEIL B.

customer_reviews.title: Screen already separating-oy...
customer_reviews.text: Well, I should have guessed this wouldn't have gone as well as I'd hoped. The screen started separating from the rest of the iPad within about a week of use. Going to try to get this fixed locally, as I've already got it set up the way I want and I don't want to be shipping back and forth hoping for the best. If I can't get it fixed, guess I'll chalk it up to a bad refurb experience. :(
customer_reviews.author: Coastal Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this purchase! You can hardly tell is was refurbished. Aside from a very small scratch (not in the way of use) it was in perfect shape. It runs very well and I could not be happier! Thanks for a fair price on a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Agentamye

customer_reviews.title: Great Folks...
customer_reviews.text: When both Apple and Company confirmed that they do not let you know that although both Apple and all resellers say it provides both wifi AND cellular service the assumption would be that one could use it for phone purposes but can't. All Ipad units say the exact same thing! So returned item and forgot to pull my simcard! They are returing it! GREAT people and totally honest and helpful. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold

customer_reviews.title: High price for outdated hardware. But still usable
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is good for a renewed product. There are definitely problems with it and having it sold at a high price for old outdated hardware kind of sucks. Can't run a lot of apps, crashes quite a bit and the battery life sucks, especially since it charges dramatically slow. Wife loves reading on it though and the product works as it should for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: djfire up

customer_reviews.title: I didn't have good luck, the charging jack on the iPad rendered it un-charge-able.
customer_reviews.text: Great iPad, but it arrived with charging problems, the charging would stop, had to be replugged a few times to start again. We kept for a month to see if it would come out of it. It wouldn't, and finally (using 4 differing cables) won't charge at all. Rose @ Amazon customer service gave full refund, with free return shipping label. Great customer service...thought I would get stiffed.
customer_reviews.author: DrumrPete

customer_reviews.title: Apple does not help
customer_reviews.text: Had my refurbished apple iPad for about six months and battery died. Amazon directed to apple for help since the battery diedI couldn’t do the diagnostics test that wanted to do. Than I got another call telling they would replace the battery for $100.00 and that they would send me a prepaid box for me to send back never heard. From them after that And didn’t even get a e-mail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Certified refurbished for the win on my mom's birthday!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this iPad refurbished on Amazon for my mom for her birthday and couldn't be happier with the result! She loves it and it looks and works like brand new. You couldn't tell it had been used and refurbished at all. I'm thrilled that I saved so much money buying refurbished! I have now purchased Amazon certified refurbished laptops, iPads and other electronics and so far have had a good experience with everything! If you're considering, you should definitely try refurbished and save money!
customer_reviews.author: Kate MahoneyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Did not come "Like New" or Clean
customer_reviews.text: Amazon Renewed Policy states "thoroughly cleans the product....... minimal to no signs of wear, no visible cosmetic imperfections when held 12 inches away." Two of the 3 iPads ordered came with several signs of wear and highly visible imperfections on both front and back (deep scratches). One ipad was filthy and fingerprints on both sides. Screens on two iPads had damage under touchscreen. Products started up fine, and were reset, but other than that, that is the only positive from the two highly damaged iPads. The 3rd iPad also has high signs of wear on backside (deep scratches), but will see how it functions since it is for a work project and will be covered with a protective case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Appeared to be great product. I used it long enough to set ...
customer_reviews.text: Appeared to be great product. I used it long enough to set it up. Problems with power, heating up, while charging, screen freezing, reboot, screen freeze. Not all of screen was responding to touch. If it responded, took numerous taps.... sorry. I returned it. Bought a new one from Amazon factory sealed box.
customer_reviews.author: C.Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying a refurbished iPad, but this was a great purchase! It came with the Apple iPad charger and I had no issues getting it fully charged. It came with no scratches or dings on it, and looks beautiful. It was reset and was like setting up a brand new iPad. I have zero complaints. This product is just as expected and I’m so glad I bought a refurbished one!
customer_reviews.author: Jsofe

customer_reviews.title: iPad was not functional, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Unit received was not functional. It would turn on but the touch screen didn't function properly and it was inputting random characters and menu selections without anyone actually using the iPad. I wouldn't purchase from this vendor again. I wouldn't recommend this seller to anyone else either.
customer_reviews.author: Vocifer
